segments.text: The Canadian rock singer ? But I heard you had a part-time job yesterday . How did you see her ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , I worked as temporary staff in her concert . Look , her poster , a CD ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So you're a big fan , eh ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not really . But I like some of her songs . She's actually very talented . She's a song writer and fashion designer , too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And she was in a movie once again , right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , though I don't think her acting skills are that great .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What was your impression of her when you saw her in person ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She looked sweeter than her pictures .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did you take a photo with her ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , there were too many people . When she got out of the car , her fans were all screaming , trying to give her flowers and to get her autographs .
segments.speaker: S1
